title: My Eyes Only
description: An application for secret message sharing specially developed for passing coincidental information. Stored messages with Laravel's encrypter that uses OpenSSL to provide AES-256 and AES-128 encryption.
features: Set only one time view or day based expiration

title: Book My Calender
description: Booking appointment slot to Google Calendar.
features: Book any predefined slots of Google Calendar.

title: Next Watch
description: Find out similar Movies or TV shows.

title: Eventony
description: Create your Even with drag and drop, share your event page, get participation report.
features: Add date, time, place on Map

title: WP Survey Plugin
description: An easy to use Survey Plugin for WordPress
features: Display on the front-end using Short-code
Get participation details on the Dashboard
